channel.title: SrcDemo2
channel.description:
Hey there.
I've been planning to make a couple of videos in Black Mesa using the SrcDemo2 software in order to get a motion blur effect.
But one problem I've come across is that when recording movies in Black Mesa with SrcDemo2, the viewmodels do not show up, or don't move at all.
Could anyone help?

item.title: SrcDemo2
item.dc:creator: NeoAX
item.description:
Hey there.

I’ve been planning to make a couple of videos in Black Mesa using the SrcDemo2 software in order to get a motion blur effect.

But one problem I’ve come across is that when recording movies in Black Mesa with SrcDemo2, the viewmodels do not show up, or don’t move at all.
